subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Frank McCourt, the owner of the Los Angeles Dodgers, has bought the operating rights for the Los Angeles Marathon and will switch the race from March 1 to Monday, Feb. 16, the Presidents’ Day holiday.
snippet: Frank McCourt, the owner of the Los Angeles Dodgers, has bought the operating rights for the Los Angeles Marathon and will switch the race from March 1 to Monday, Feb. 16, the Presidents’ Day holiday.
